jobExecutionId.description: Foreign Key to the Job Execution this chunk belongs to

last.description: True if this is the last chunk False otherwise

state.description: Represents the current state of the chunk processing, possible values: InProgress, Completed, Error

chunkSize.description: The total number of records in the chunk

processedAmount.description: The number of records which have been processed already

createdDate.description: Instant when chunk processing was started

completedDate.description: Instant when chunk processing was completed

error.description: Contains an error message and trace stack if the chunk processing has failed, makes sense only if State == Error
